etymology.description: 信(信) (xìn, "trust") + 義(義) (yì, "righteousness") = moral concepts suggesting a trustworthy and righteous area -> 区(區) (qū, "district") indicates an administrative division.
etymology.interpretation: 信义(信義) (xìnyì, "trust and righteousness") suggests a place governed by principles of trust and righteousness, reflecting positive attributes. Originally likely chosen for its auspicious qualities, this name now denotes a distinguished administrative region, Xinyi District, in Taipei.

examples.chinese: 我住在信义区(我住在信義區)。
信义区(信義區)经济繁荣(經濟繁榮)，吸引许多国际企业(吸引許多國際企業)。
examples.pinyin: Xìnyì Qū jīngjì fánróng, xīyǐn xǔduō guójì qǐyè.
examples.english: Xinyi District's economy is booming and attracts many international companies.
